import React from 'react' import clsx from 'clsx' const LoadingSpinner = ({ size = 'md', color = 'primary', className = '', text = null }) => { const sizeClasses = { xs: 'h-3 w-3', sm: 'h-4 w-4', md: 'h-6 w-6', lg: 'h-8 w-8', xl: 'h-12 w-12' } const colorClasses = { primary: 'text-primary-600', secondary: 'text-secondary-600', white: 'text-white', gray: 'text-gray-600' } return (
{text && ( {text} )}
) } export default LoadingSpinner
